attributes.action: Use the Royal Navy to stop the small boats!
attributes.background:
The current Government has failed to stop the boats and has no clear plan to do so.
We believe that the Government should follow President Trump's advice and use the military (in this case the Royal Navy) to stop the boats.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
